'''1.19.11''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on July 26, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/7803469757581|title=Minecraft - 1.19.11 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=July 26, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that could cause mobs to not load into the world if their saved y-position was greater than or equal to 25.
* Fixed incorrect texture rendering of players when using RTX on Windows. ({{bug|MCPE-156577}})
* Fixed incorrect texture rendering of some mobs, like horses, when using RTX on Windows. ({{bug|MCPE-132747}})
* Fixed an issue that prevented command blocks from saving if a command block alias wasn’t provided while playing on Realms.
* Fixed a bug where suspended accounts could not play local worlds or navigate the menus on Xbox platforms.
